name: Poetry Slam
description:
Poetry Slam is a local multiplayer Poem 'em Up where two poets duel it out with their words.

Construct poems using over 70 randomly generated lines and throw them into battle with tens of thousands of combinations! Each poem has different stats, and can do different things!

Credits:

  • Art and Animation: Mikail Khan
  • Voice Acting: Peter Francis
  • Programming: Sebastian Scaini
